messages.title: POST OFFICE ACTION
messages.content: We will stop the closure of crucial post offices to maintain a postal office. We want to find a sustainable way of keeping our network of post offices.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stephen Holland condemns Labour's plans for higher taxes and has criticized Labour’s pre-Budget Report.
Local Conservative candidate Alex Raisbeck is monitoring traffic problems affecting residents, particularly those living along Nangreave Road and Bowerfield Ave.

issues.economy: Stephen Holland condemns Labour's plans for higher taxes and has criticized Labour’s pre-Budget Report.
issues.environment: Supports work for environmental rights by assisting local groups, backing efforts of voluntary groups working for the cause, and encouraging recycling.

housing.content: Stephen Holland's comments on the pre-Budget Report criticizes the financial strategies under Labour's governance, implying issues with housing and the economy.

leaflet.personalStatement: We need change to get our country back on its feet.

politicalExperience.achievements: Condemned Labour’s plans for higher taxes and criticized Labour’s pre-Budget Report.

contactInformation.address: Conservatives, 15 Chester Road, Hazel Grove, Stockport, SK7 5NU

images.caption: Stephen Holland at Offerton Liberal Democrat Headquarters – Rallying Opposition to Post Office Closures

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet endorses David Cameron’s leadership and condemns the pre-Budget Report by Alistair Darling.
